title: study help
content: where to start basics of python and go to advance level including dsa??any other recommendations others than freecodecamp?

comments.body: y'all it doesn't take a lot to help someone¬†
I hope someone genuinely helps I'm being serious¬†

Programming for everybody - Python in coursera by Charles Severance 
Audit the course for free
Can skip a lot of the basics

If you don't know python from before , you may feel the classes and the teacher is going a bit fast . 
You can study from any of the YouTube channels or from the textbook which the teacher tells .
for DSA take a look at striver a to z dsa
